data.partBlankContent: Harvestmen are not dangerous to humans. None o_ the desc_____ species h__ poison gla___. They a__ not `` true '' spiders ev__ though th__ look li__ spiders i_ many wa__. For example, harvestmen have no venom or silk glands; spiders have these.
data.fullContent: Harvestmen are not dangerous to humans. None of the described species has poison glands. They are not `` true '' spiders even though they look like spiders in many ways. For example, harvestmen have no venom or silk glands; spiders have these.
data.answer: 盲蜘蛛对人类没有危险。这种动物的品种都没有毒腺。它们不是“真正的”蜘蛛，尽管它们在很多方面看起来像蜘蛛。例如，盲蜘蛛没有毒液或丝腺; 而蜘蛛有这些。
